column1: '''The Lord of the Rings: The Motion Picture Trilogy''' is a Blu-ray pack of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings'' film series]] released on April 6, 2010 by [[New Line Cinema]]. It consists of the theatrical editions in high-definition and six DVDs of bonus features.
